3-1 (Pre-training): “A common issue is that you are using a pre-trained model, which is not instruction-tuned and thus does not respond to instructions.”  This statement indicates that the model exists in a purely pre-trained form before any subsequent alignment, and that such a base checkpoint, while fully pre-trained, will not inherently obey instruction-style prompts because it lacks an instruction-tuning stage.

3-1 (Pre-training)__evidence.quote: A common issue is that you are using a pre-trained model, which is not instruction-tuned and thus does not respond to instructions.
